job.title: AWS DevOps Engineer
job.description: ltpgtTitle AzureAWS DevOps EngineerltpgtltpgtLocation 100 RemoteltpgtltpgtType DirecthireltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtJob Description Global company has an urgent need for a junior to midlevel AWS DevOps Engineer The position will be the righthand to the VP of Architecture and DevOps and has growth potential as they grow their DevOps environment Candidate must be willing to move to AWS in 6 months as they acquired a competitor who is an AzureAWS shop and they do not have this expertise Seeking a candidate that is focused on organizational issues social aspects understanding how things are done ability to communicate and passion for teaching not just technical Charisma is welcomedltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtRequired Skillsltpgtltpgt AWSltpgtltpgt CICDltpgtltpgt Dockerltpgtltpgt Observability metrics and alertingltpgtltpgtltpgt
